dialogue.introduction: I'm the light aircraft carrier, Shouhou. Yes, I'm a little small, but please make a place for me on your fleet!
dialogue.library_intro: First of the Shouhou-class aircraft carriers. Originally, a submarine tender. If it's not the flagship or the main fleet but a small task-force, then by all means use me! If you make use of me, I'll surely get good results!
dialogue.secretary2: Eh, do I like coral? No, I hate it!
dialogue.secretary3: Um...if you touch me too much, I can't launch my aircraft. Can we do it after I've launched everything?
dialogue.secretaryidle: One dive bomber... two dive bombers... three... Ah, Admiral! It's okay, I'm not lonely or anything. I have my planes with me and... Ah, yes!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Once in a while, won't you try taking it easy and be yourself? Forget about things like sortie and your duty... I mean, I'm sorry! That's no good, isn't it...
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, am I being useful? Really? Then...that's great. From now on, I'll always be by your side!
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral, you have a message from command.
dialogue.equipment1: Huh? I'm so happy! For you to be giving me strength!
dialogue.equipment2: Thank you! Now, I'll be able to keep up with the fleet carriers!
dialogue.supply: Huh? Huh? I'm so happy! For you to be giving me strength! Supplies, much appreciated.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Time for a little rest. I'll be well shortly.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: If I stay like this, I'll just be a target for the enemy. I'm sorry, but I need to rest a little.
dialogue.docking_complete: Thank you for waiting! Ship's repairs have been completed.
dialogue.ship_construction: Looks like a new ship has arrived.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: A fleet has just returned to port from an operation.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Will my planes be okay...? No, it'll be fine!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet spotted! Bombers, please prepare for flight!
dialogue.air_battle: Straying too far from the fleet is dangerous...
dialogue.attack: I'm still an aircraft carrier! I can do it!
dialogue.night_battle: Second attack squadron, are you ready? Then, prepare for launch!
dialogue.mvp: Yay, I did it! I'm so happy! From now on, I'll be sure to keep working hard!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Ah... I'm done for... I can't fight like this.
dialogue.white_day_2015: What's with the package, Admiral? There's a pleasant smell~ Eh, is this for me? Thank you so much!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, we finally reached our two years anniversary. For your support throughout the years, we're truly thankful!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: The rainy season, huh... This is also the season in which I was launched, I... Ah, no, it is nothing. I'm fine...
dialogue.early_summer_2015: For summer, this wear suits perfectly, Admiral. Isn't it cold during the winter, you say? W- well. N-no! It's fine!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas, Admiral. Um... I have a present for Admiral. If it's okay, please accept it.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year! Please take care of methis year, too!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun, isn't it? So i just throw these beans, right? Ei! Oh no...! Admiral, I-I'm sorry. Forgive me for hitting your eye...
